com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core

Class GameHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core.AbstractGameHandler
        • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core.GameHandler

  • public class GameHandler
extends AbstractGameHandler
    An implementation of AbstractGameHandler with fixed level-up rate and accelerating falling speed.
    Author:
    tilastokeskus

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
               throws LaunchException
        Starts the game and notifies all observers with message: "start"

        To start the game, the handler requires the game, score handler and difficulty be set.

        Specified by:
        startGame in class AbstractGameHandler
        Throws:
        LaunchException - thrown when the game cannot be started due to uninitialized or invalid mandatory fields.

      • nextRound

        protected void nextRound()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGameHandler
        Simulates the next round of the game. Notifies all observers with the message: "next"
        Specified by:

        public void terminateGame()

      • togglePause

        public void togglePause()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGameHandler
        Toggles the pause-state of the game. When paused, the game should not advance. Notifies all observers with message: "pause" or "resume"
        Specified by:
        togglePause in class AbstractGameHandler

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGameHandler
        Returns whether or not the game is currently running. The game is running when the handler has been started, it is not paused, and the game is not over.
        Specified by:
        isRunning in class AbstractGameHandler
        Returns:
        true if the game is running, false if not.

        Description copied from class: AbstractGameHandler
